code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Chatbox=()=>{const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState("");const handleClickPrescription=()=>{console.log("Prescription clicked");};const handleClickVaccine=()=>{console.log("Vaccine clicked");};const handleClickSick=()=>{console.log("Sick clicked");};const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(e.key==="Enter"){console.log(inputValue);setInputValue("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chatbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'1100px',flex:1,display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'space-between',paddingTop:'600px',paddingLeft:'20px',paddingRight:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'20px',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setInputValue(e.target.value),onKeyDown:handleKeyDown,type:"text",placeholder:"How can MediCompanion help?",style:{padding:'10px',fontSize:'16px',border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:'5px',flex:1}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClickPrescription,style:{padding:'10px 20px',fontSize:'14px',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',backgroundColor:'#ddd',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Prescriptions..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClickVaccine,style:{padding:'10px 20px',fontSize:'14px',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',backgroundColor:'#ddd',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Vaccines..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClickSick,style:{padding:'10px 20px',fontSize:'14px',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',backgroundColor:'#ddd',cursor:'pointer'},children:"I feel sick..."})]})]})})});};export default Chatbox;
